biotools.summary: Allows the user to search for over-represented words in a set of sequences and to search for discriminative words using negative sequence data. It employs this functionality as a means to search for transcription factor binding motifs.

bioschemas.name: WordSpy
bioschemas.summary: Allows the user to search for over-represented words in a set of sequences and to search for discriminative words using negative sequence data. It employs this functionality as a means to search for transcription factor binding motifs.
